content.text:
[@Maleficient](@KpPLISvjzw8CkoWOJ3zKXBgPtNDuzUgfyGbJEfbJ4H8=.ed25519) 

Identifying yourself as a fascist or homophobe is "really throwing shit at people" though. 

Could you unpack your ideas here a bit further? To me this reads as "we should pay more attention to what the bigots have to say" but I can't imagine why someone would hold that position.
